meaningMnemonic: You are so <radical>sick</radical> that you've come to look like the <radical>humble</radical> <radical>stool</radical>: <kanji>thin</kanji>. Eerily thin, in fact.
readingMnemonic: When you're this <kanji>thin</kanji>, your <reading>sou</reading>l (そう) is visible from outside of your body too.
